Edited May 9, 2015 by Friend Bear
Hm, I can't check for sure right now, but I want to say the drill is in one of the 550 science nodes
The Science Tech node (The telescope) has the first scanners, immediately after it is the auger and refinery.

There it is! Thank you.

Yeah I didn't think to look that far because it had been giving me contracts so early.
